aka: 大胆接近！サメガールズとタイガーシャーク

cast.name: 奥丽伊·卡瓦洛 Auli'i Cravalho

trans_title: 大胆接近！サメガールズとタイガーシャーク
introduction: Every year tiger sharks gather in big numbers in Maui. What’s the cause? It’s a mystery that’s a decade in the making. Now, a team of fearless shark scientists gets hands-on with one of the ocean’s largest predators to find out. That means free diving, face-to-face and unprotected. But these young women will do whatever it takes to get the data they need to crack the case.
